verses.verse: Then they told <WH5046> David, <WH1732> saying, <WH559> Behold, <WH2009> the Philistines <WH6430> fight <WH3898> against Keilah, <WH7084> and they <WH1992> rob <WH8154> <WH853> the threshingfloors. <WH1637>

Therefore David <WH1732> inquired <WH7592> of the LORD, <WH3068> saying, <WH559> Shall I go <WH1980> and smite <WH5221> these <WH428> Philistines? <WH6430> And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> David, <WH1732> Go, <WH1980> and smite <WH5221> the Philistines, <WH6430> and save <WH3467> <WH853> Keilah. <WH7084>

And David's <WH1732> men <WH376> said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, Behold, <WH2009> we <WH587> be afraid <WH3372> here <WH6311> in Judah: <WH3063> how much <WH637> more then if <WH3588> we come <WH1980> to Keilah <WH7084> against <WH413> the armies <WH4634> of the Philistines? <WH6430>

Then David <WH1732> inquired <WH7592> of the LORD <WH3068> yet <WH5750> again. <WH3254> And the LORD <WH3068> answered <WH6030> him and said, <WH559> Arise, <WH6965> go down <WH3381> to Keilah; <WH7084> for <WH3588> I <WH589> will deliver <WH5414> <WH853> the Philistines <WH6430> into thine hand. <WH3027>

So David <WH1732> and his men <WH376> went <WH1980> to Keilah, <WH7084> and fought <WH3898> with the Philistines, <WH6430> and brought away <WH5090> <WH853> their cattle, <WH4735> and smote <WH5221> them with a great <WH1419> slaughter. <WH4347> So David <WH1732> saved <WH3467> <WH853> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Keilah. <WH7084>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when Abiathar <WH54> the son <WH1121> of Ahimelech <WH288> fled <WH1272> to <WH413> David <WH1732> to Keilah, <WH7084> that he came down <WH3381> with an ephod <WH646> in his hand. <WH3027>

And it was told <WH5046> Saul <WH7586> that <WH3588> David <WH1732> was come <WH935> to Keilah. <WH7084> And Saul <WH7586> said, <WH559> God <WH430> hath delivered <WH5234> him into mine hand; <WH3027> for <WH3588> he is shut in, <WH5462> by entering <WH935> into a town <WH5892> that hath gates <WH1817> and bars. <WH1280>

And Saul <WH7586> called <WH8085> <WH853> all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> together to war, <WH4421> to go down <WH3381> to Keilah, <WH7084> to besiege <WH6696> <WH413> David <WH1732> and his men. <WH376>

And David <WH1732> knew <WH3045> that <WH3588> Saul <WH7586> secretly practiced <WH2790> mischief <WH7451> against <WH5921> him; and he said <WH559> to <WH413> Abiathar <WH54> the priest, <WH3548> Bring hither <WH5066> the ephod. <WH646>

Then said <WH559> David, <WH1732> O LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> thy servant <WH5650> hath certainly heard <WH8085> <WH8085> that <WH3588> Saul <WH7586> seeketh <WH1245> to come <WH935> to <WH413> Keilah, <WH7084> to destroy <WH7843> the city <WH5892> for my sake. <WH5668>

Will the men <WH1167> of Keilah <WH7084> deliver me up <WH5462> into his hand? <WH3027> will Saul <WH7586> come down, <WH3381> as <WH834> thy servant <WH5650> hath heard? <WH8085> O LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> I beseech thee, <WH4994> tell <WH5046> thy servant. <WH5650> And the LORD <WH3068> said, <WH559> He will come down. <WH3381>

Then said <WH559> David, <WH1732> Will the men <WH1167> of Keilah <WH7084> deliver <WH5462> me and my men <WH376> into the hand <WH3027> of Saul? <WH7586> And the LORD <WH3068> said, <WH559> They will deliver thee up. <WH5462>

Then David <WH1732> and his men, <WH376> which were about six <WH8337> hundred, <WH3967> <WH376> arose <WH6965> and departed <WH3318> out of Keilah, <WH4480> <WH7084> and went <WH1980> whithersoever <WH834> they could go. <WH1980> And it was told <WH5046> Saul <WH7586> that <WH3588> David <WH1732> was escaped <WH4422> from Keilah; <WH4480> <WH7084> and he forbore <WH2308> to go forth. <WH3318>

And David <WH1732> abode <WH3427> in the wilderness <WH4057> in strongholds, <WH4679> and remained <WH3427> in a mountain <WH2022> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Ziph. <WH2128> And Saul <WH7586> sought <WH1245> him every <WH3605> day, <WH3117> but God <WH430> delivered <WH5414> him not <WH3808> into his hand. <WH3027>

And David <WH1732> saw <WH7200> that <WH3588> Saul <WH7586> was come out <WH3318> to seek <WH1245> <WH853> his life: <WH5315> and David <WH1732> was in the wilderness <WH4057> of Ziph <WH2128> in a wood. <WH2793>

And Jonathan <WH3083> Saul's <WH7586> son <WH1121> arose, <WH6965> and went <WH1980> to <WH413> David <WH1732> into the wood, <WH2793> and strengthened <WH2388> <WH853> his hand <WH3027> in God. <WH430>

And he said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, Fear <WH3372> not: <WH408> for <WH3588> the hand <WH3027> of Saul <WH7586> my father <WH1> shall not <WH3808> find <WH4672> thee; and thou <WH859> shalt be king <WH4427> over <WH5921> Israel, <WH3478> and I <WH595> shall be <WH1961> next <WH4932> unto thee; and that <WH3651> also <WH1571> Saul <WH7586> my father <WH1> knoweth. <WH3045>

And they two <WH8147> made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> before <WH6440> the LORD: <WH3068> and David <WH1732> abode <WH3427> in the wood, <WH2793> and Jonathan <WH3083> went <WH1980> to his house. <WH1004>

Then came up <WH5927> the Ziphites <WH2130> to <WH413> Saul <WH7586> to Gibeah, <WH1390> saying, <WH559> Doth not <WH3808> David <WH1732> hide himself <WH5641> with <WH5973> us in strongholds <WH4679> in the wood, <WH2793> in the hill <WH1389> of Hachilah, <WH2444> which <WH834> is on the south <WH4480> <WH3225> of Jeshimon? <WH3452>

Now <WH6258> therefore, O king, <WH4428> come down <WH3381> according to all <WH3605> the desire <WH185> of thy soul <WH5315> to come down; <WH3381> and our part shall be to deliver <WH5462> him into the king's <WH4428> hand. <WH3027>
And Saul <WH7586> said, <WH559> Blessed <WH1288> be ye <WH859> of the LORD; <WH3068> for <WH3588> ye have compassion <WH2550> on <WH5921> me.

Go, <WH1980> I pray you, <WH4994> prepare <WH3559> yet, <WH5750> and know <WH3045> and see <WH7200> <WH853> his place <WH4725> where <WH834> his haunt <WH7272> is, <WH1961> and who <WH4310> hath seen <WH7200> him there: <WH8033> for <WH3588> it is told <WH559> <WH413> me that he <WH1931> dealeth very subtlely. <WH6191> <WH6191>

See <WH7200> therefore, and take knowledge <WH3045> of all <WH4480> <WH3605> the lurking places <WH4224> where <WH834> he hideth himself, <WH2244> and come ye again <WH7725> to <WH413> me with <WH413> the certainty, <WH3559> and I will go <WH1980> with <WH854> you: and it shall come to pass, <WH1961> if <WH518> he be <WH1961> <WH3426> in the land, <WH776> that I will search him out <WH2664> <WH853> throughout all <WH3605> the thousands <WH505> of Judah. <WH3063>

And they arose, <WH6965> and went <WH1980> to Ziph <WH2128> before <WH6440> Saul: <WH7586> but David <WH1732> and his men <WH376> were in the wilderness <WH4057> of Maon, <WH4584> in the plain <WH6160> on <WH413> the south <WH3225> of Jeshimon. <WH3452>

Saul <WH7586> also and his men <WH376> went <WH1980> to seek <WH1245> him. And they told <WH5046> David: <WH1732> wherefore he came down <WH3381> into a rock, <WH5553> and abode <WH3427> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Maon. <WH4584> And when Saul <WH7586> heard <WH8085> that, he pursued <WH7291> after <WH310> David <WH1732> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Maon. <WH4584>

And Saul <WH7586> went <WH1980> on this side <WH4480> <WH2088> <WH4480> <WH6654> of the mountain, <WH2022> and David <WH1732> and his men <WH376> on that side <WH4480> <WH2088> <WH4480> <WH6654> of the mountain: <WH2022> and David <WH1732> made haste <WH1961> <WH2648> to get away <WH1980> for fear of <WH4480> <WH6440> Saul; <WH7586> for Saul <WH7586> and his men <WH376> compassed <WH5849> <WH413> David <WH1732> and his men <WH376> round about to take <WH8610> them.

But there came <WH935> a messenger <WH4397> unto <WH413> Saul, <WH7586> saying, <WH559> Haste <WH4116> thee, and come; <WH1980> for <WH3588> the Philistines <WH6430> have invaded <WH6584> <WH5921> the land. <WH776>

Wherefore Saul <WH7586> returned <WH7725> from pursuing <WH4480> <WH7291> after <WH310> David, <WH1732> and went <WH1980> against <WH7125> the Philistines: <WH6430> therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> they called <WH7121> that <WH1931> place <WH4725> Sela-hammahlekoth. <WH5555>
And David <WH1732> went up <WH5927> from thence, <WH4480> <WH8033> and dwelt <WH3427> in strongholds <WH4679> at En-gedi. <WH5872>
